body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Unify the error handling in Cassandra layer:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/common/persistence/cassandra/cassandraPersistence.go#L1515-L1598

title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - rewrite Cassandra error handling
